mapper.update: update c_user set profile = #{profile} where user_id = #{id}
update c_user set status=#{status} where user_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select user_id id,phone,password,dharmaName,province,city,gender,personal_sign personalSign,profile,status, regist_time registTime from c_user
select user_id id,phone,password,dharmaName,province,city,gender,personal_sign personalSign,profile,status, regist_time registTime from c_user where phone=#{phone} and password=#{password}
select user_id id,phone,password,dharmaName,province,city,gender,personal_sign personalSign,profile,status, regist_time registTime from c_user where phone=#{phone}
select phone from c_user where phone=#{phone}
select DATE_FORMAT(regist_time,'%Y年%m月') month,count(user_id) count from c_user group by month;
select count(user_id) value,province name from c_user where gender=#{gender} group by province
select max(value) from (select count(user_id) value,province name from c_user group by province) t
